0.1: Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes.

1.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

2.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

field.0: Summons Guoba, who will continuously breathe fire at opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
field.2: Guoba loves to eat spicy food. Problem is, his stomach can't handle something this spicy.

field.0: Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Pyronado whirling around her.
field.1: The Pyronado will move with your character for the ability's duration, dealing Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path.
field.3: There will never be enough heat. Never.

field.0: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.
When Guoba Attack's effect ends, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.
When Xiangling cooks an ATK-boosting dish perfectly, she has a 12% chance to receive double the product.

0.0: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their <pyro>Pyro RES</pyro> reduced by 15% for 6s.

1.0: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro>.

4.0: Increases the Level of Guoba Attack by 3.

5.0: For the duration of Pyronado, all party members receive a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus.
